channel.title: 1 one of each item

item.title: 1 one of each item
item.dc:creator: @3_Days_Grace 3 Days Grace
item.description:
@3_Days_Grace wrote:

On my server, I have a mystery box that obviously gives random items but they usually give more than 1 of each item to you. How can I make it that the player can only get one of the item. I’ve added this but didn’t work.

if(itemID == 4565 && (playerHasItem(4565, 1) || playerCheckBank(4565, 1))) { sM("You already have Basket of Eggs."); break; }
I put this under case 236. I’m pretty sure thats not where I’m supposed to put it but I don’t know which case to put it in.

Read full topic
